description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A full world as a track. Run freely where you want and search your favorite path. Comptete against 60 cars of 6 differents type.   And when you think you've seen all, try the chaotic Rally!
